file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-31-01-04 - PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Public Address Amplifier. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - REMOV- ALL 23-31-01-000-801-A AL PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - INSTAL- ALL 23-31-01-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-31-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Public Address Amplifier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the PA circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) (PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036) Make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (3) (POST-MOD SB145-32-0036) Install the safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Open access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the knurled nut (3). (2) Pull the Public Address Amplifier (1) until it is disconnected from the electrical connector (2) attached to its mounting rack. (3) Remove the Public Address Amplifier (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Public Address Amplifier - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 113 DET. A 1. PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER 3. KNURLED NUT 2. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM230134.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PUBLIC ADDRESS AMPLIFIER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Public Address Amplifier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - PASSENGER ADDRESS & CABIN INTERPHONE AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-801-A/500 SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the forward electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the Public Address Amplifier (1) on its mounting rack. (2) Push the Public Address Amplifier (1) until it is connected to the electrical connector (2) attached to its mounting rack. (3) Attach the knurled nut (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-31-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the PA circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Do the Cabin Interphone operational test ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-801-A/500). (3) Close access door 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (4) (POST-MOD SB145-32-0036) Remove the safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-31-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
